name: ESG Reporting for ESG Leaders and Managers
content: ESG reporting has emerged to fulfil the demand for transparency on data covering a company’s operations impacting the environment, social and corporate governance. It helps to evaluate how an organization evolves through the risk and opportunities occurred by changing circumstances. The workshop will equip ESG leaders and managers with essential reporting skills required of various disciplines in the context of ESG reporting. Participants will be able to apply ESG in both financial and non-financial reporting and converse confidently with regulators on ESG data, accounting and reporting. Date: 13 – 16 February 2023 Time: 2.00 PM – 6.00PM (GMT +8) Register now to join ESG Reporting for ESG Leaders and Managers workshop.
